Privacy Policy

We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting any information you share with us. Here's what you need to know:

Information We Collect

  • Contact details when you reach out to us (name, email, phone)
  • Basic usage data to improve our service (pages visited, time spent)

How We Use Your Information

  • To respond to your messages and inquiries
  • To send you updates about new opportunities (if you subscribe)
  • To improve our website and services

Information Protection

  • We never sell your personal information
  • We use standard security measures to protect your data
  • We only keep your information for as long as necessary

Your Rights

  • Unsubscribe from our updates at any time
  • Request to see what information we have about you
  • Ask us to delete your information

Questions?
